tactu5

Class Aggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • tactu5.Aggregator

  • public class Aggregator
extends java.lang.Object
    Aggregator class generates objects to feed the sequencer. It's possible to pass it Sequence and ClusterSequence objects. You could create many Aggregator objects and use them to change the internal sequencer contents in real time.
    Author:
    Alessandro Capozzo, RBDGT (www.rbdgt.be)

      Add ClusterSequence to Aggregator container.

      Add ClusterSequence to Aggregator container, it allows to define a time offset in milliseconds.
      void addSequence(Sequence s)
      Add a sequence with no offset declared.
      void addSequence(Sequence s, float offSet)
      Add a sequence to Aggregator container, it allows to define a time offset in milliseconds.

      Returns the aggregated score.

      Reset the Aggregator-object.

      • getScore

        public InternalSequence getScore()
        Returns the aggregated score. It's necessary to call this method to feed the Tactu5 internal sequencer.
        Returns:
        InternalSequence
